mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_type, platform_type, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phoneNum, user_email, thumbnail) values (#{user_type}, #{platform_type}, #{user_ID}, #{user_PW}, #{user_name}, #{user_phoneNum}, #{user_email}, #{thumbnail});
mapper.update: update tbl_user set user_name = #{user_name}, user_phoneNum = #{user_phoneNum}, user_email = #{user_email}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, update_date = now() where user_idx = #{user_idx};
